snippet.title: ONE of 500 - Trailer (2020)
snippet.description:
Experience the stories an the authentic world of the Gospel in a gripping high quality video game. 
ONE of 500 is a story-based adventure game in which you experience the greatest story ever told, the story around the events of Jesus from Nazareth, from a whole new perspective. 
You will be confronted with the big questions in life, you have to find your own standing and make conscious and hard decisions. While you live through your own adventure, your story intertwines with the events of the gospel in a gripping and meaningful way.

Gamepage
www.oneof500-game.com
Studio: The interdisciplinaryt team of Lightword Productions
www.lightword-productions.com 

Discord-Community: https://discord.gg/VAvgtkVauy

Social Media:

www.twitter.com/oneof500
www.twitch.com/lightword-productions
